name: Royale Battle Craft City 3D
description:
Welcome to the royale battle mode in the city! Be brave, soldier!

You're not alone in this big cube world city. Then you will not be happy. Enemies do not slumber, so be on the alert! Beware of enemies, they can be very dangerous. And if I have met them, then give them a rebuff.

At your disposal are many weapons and ammunition that you can buy in the store at the beginning of the battle. Take the most powerful cannons and you will not be afraid of enemies! The game is available in various weapons: pistols, shotgun assault rifles like ak-47, sniper rifle, machine gun, grenade and even homing missile launcher! But if all ammunition runs out then use your strong fist to attack. This is not an effective weapon, but you have no other choice to survive.

The goal of the game is to remain one survivor in the city. On the map, you will see the number of remaining enemies on the map - they are marked with a red marker. You are marked with a green arrow - which shows which way you are looking now.

Optimized graphics, modern gameplay and frenzied action is what this new game in the genre of survival will give you. The city is very large. You can climb high skyscrapers. Jumping off be careful - falling from a high altitude you will damaged.

Start battle, soldier! Be the best in this craft survival city!
